item.description:
Yoga anyone? $12.00 fee. Level I/II class in a wonderful studio space in a refurbished factory building in Holyoke with excellent teachers. Wear clothes that you can bend and stretch in. After, a light and healthy lunch at the cafe next door?
http://www.vegayoga.c...
http://www.artisansca...
*If I'm not in the lobby right away it will be because I'm finishing up in the studio in the beginner class (I have a class card). As soon as the beginner class ends we'll go in promptly since this is a popular class and we can't reserve mat space :)
item.how_to_find_us: *I'll be outside the door of the studio, on the second floor.
item.name: Yoga and Lunch
